CPGradientBlendingMode blendingMode
 The color blending mode used to create the gradient.
CGFloat angle
 The axis angle of an axial gradient, expressed in degrees.
CPGradientType gradientType
 The gradient type.

Detailed Description

Draws color gradient fills.

Based on CTGradient (http://blog.oofn.net/2006/01/15/gradients-in-cocoa/). CTGradient is in public domain (Thanks Chad Weider!)

Todo:
More documentation needed

Member Function Documentation

- (CPGradient *) addColorStop: (CPColor *)  color
atPosition: (CGFloat)  position 

Copies the current gradient and adds a color stop.

Adds a color stop with color at position in elementList. If two elements are at the same position then it is added immediately after the one that was there already.

Parameters:
color The color.
position The color stop position (0 ≤ position ≤ 1).
Returns:
A copy of the current gradient with the new color stop.

inContext: (CGContextRef)  context

+ (CPGradient *) gradientWithBeginningColor: (CPColor *)  begin
endingColor: (CPColor *)  end 

Creates and returns a new CPGradient instance initialized with an axial linear gradient between two given colors.

Parameters:
begin The beginning color.
end The ending color.
Returns:
A new CPGradient instance initialized with an axial linear gradient between the two given colors.

+ (CPGradient *) gradientWithBeginningColor: (CPColor *)  begin
endingColor: (CPColor *)  end
beginningPosition: (CGFloat)  beginningPosition
endingPosition: (CGFloat)  endingPosition 

Creates and returns a new CPGradient instance initialized with an axial linear gradient between two given colors, at two given normalized positions.

Parameters:
begin The beginning color.
end The ending color.
beginningPosition The beginning position (0 ≤ beginningPosition ≤ 1).
endingPosition The ending position (0 ≤ endingPosition ≤ 1).
Returns:
A new CPGradient instance initialized with an axial linear gradient between the two given colors, at two given normalized positions.
